text: umatu cattaip paiyil umatu kaiyaip pukuttuviraka. Atu macarra pirakacamulla venmaiyaka velippatum. Nir payappatatirukkum poruttu umatu kaikalai umatu vilavil certtuk kolviraka. Hpir'avnitamum avanutaiya talaivarkalitamum nir cellum poruttu ivvirantum umatu iraivanal umakku alikkappatta iru attatcikalakum. Niccayamaka avarkal pavam ceyyum makkalaka irukkirarkal'' (enru avarukkuk kurappattatu)
